name: Ballistic Tennis
description:
Welcome to Ballistic Tennis! (PLAY IN FULL SCREEN)

Ballistic Tennis is a local micro multiplayer pong clone with a few twists. It has camera shake and particle explosions.

It is a local 2 player game where the objective is to destroy the other player's 3 goals.

Controls:

Left Player (p1)

-w for up

-s for down

Right Player (p2)

-Up arrow for up

-Down arrow for down

The objective of this project is to get experience making games with strong feedback systems and html launches. Please feel free to rate, comment, and tell me how to improve my work. Thank you, and have fun!

Sounds licensed from Soundstripe.

Also thanks to the unity forums and Brackeys for all the wonderful info.

Thank you to the original creators of pong, Allan Alcorn and Atari, for having created a game which is timeless and wonderful to this day.

Code and Art by Paul-Hugo Dlugy-Hegwer
